Text:
Whats with the mKv?
you should stick with wmv... the only reason i download high def is so i can watch it on my xbox360... come on...
takes like an extra 4 hours to convert it to wmv, any chance youll change your ways?
Just watch it on your PC. Really good resolution!
007ace - try opening the file with Media Player and then saving it as an avi file. Takes just a few minutes.  Works great for me.

That's simply perfect on my glossy HD Macbook Pro. Much, much better than those 300MB fake HD files. 
You won't regret, mates, it's over 1G, but the episodes get more interesting with excelent quality, and they come only once a week. It's worth.
Peace.
